title: Men and Women after #metoo, a new relationship? (part 1 of 3)
description:
If the cultural conversation looks increasingly like a dysfunctional relationship between men and women, how can we move forward? This is the first in a series of films on the subject from Rebel Wisdom.

Rebel Wisdom is releasing a series of films on the topic - called 'Men and Women after #metoo, a new relationship?' - including exclusive interviews with the director of the Red Pill Movie, Cassie Jaye, and the man known as the father of the men's movement, Warren Farrell.

Part 2: Interview with Cassie Jaye here: https://youtu.be/9uaCljuywkY

Part 3: Warren Farrell interview here: https://youtu.be/ESiyb28fTQ4

Rebel Wisdom is running workshops for men and women to get a direct experience of the ideas in our films: https://rebelwisdom.co.uk/events

Get tickets for our London event 'Join the Great Intellectual Awakening' on 18 September here: https://www.tickettailor.com/events/rebelwisdom/193294 

Find us on iTunes and Spotify, or visit rebelwisdom.podbean.com to download Rebel Wisdom as an audio podcast. 

To help us make more of these films, please consider becoming a Patron: www.patreon.com/rebelwisdom
